item.title: Report E-2025030070
item.description:
Report E-2025030070

Identified by scraper @ 2025-03-16T21:12:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-02-28
  • City: CHICAGO
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: R&L CARRIERS SHARED SERVICES, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 5000
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On February 28, 2025, one (1) 55-gallon drum of lactic acid had a leaking cap and released approximately one (1) ounce of product to the top of the drum. R+L Carriers retained Cura Emergency Services, LC who dispatched a crew from HazChem Environmental (HCE) to remediate the site. The crew replaced the cap of the drum and staged it for further shipment.
